How we will work with you

Painting making process

Send a photo and your wishes

We prepare design options based on your requirements

You approve the layout and the artist starts work

Choose a baguette frame and design option

Address and convenient delivery time are agreed

You pay the remaining amount to the courier upon receipt of the painting

Framing with baguette frames

We can offer you a design in any frame from a huge assortment at will.

My husband gave a portrait to a friend, and I also wanted to order. Of all the layouts, this one immediately sunk into the soul! And it fits perfectly into the interior of my living room. Now it hangs here in a place of honor, and every time I use it. All my family loved it too!

Irina Antonova, Kiev

Very positive cartoon made from my photo.

FAQ

We will answer any of your questions

How long does it take to craete a painting?

The lead time depends on three factors: the complexity of the painting, the style of painting and the size. Average lead time is 7 days excluding delivery time. In some cases, at the request of the customer, the period can be reduced to 5 days.

Note: If you decide to change something in the picture, make adjustments - this may take additional time, which is not taken into account under the agreed deadline.

Will I be able to see the painting before receiving ?

Yes. When ready, we send by e-mail a digital photo of your painting, so that you can, if necessary, make your adjustments and wishes, if any. You can also see the painting "live" in our salon. Let your manager know about it.

What format should the photos be

We work with all known image formats! Through the site you can upload JPEG, TIFF, PNG up to 50 megabytes in size. You must own the copyright or have permission to use the image. If you have a different image format (RAW, PDF), then you can use FTP uploader. If you want to take a photo from a paper photo (not digital), send it to us, we will scan, process and return the photo with your order!

Can I give special instructions to the artist

When you place your order on the site, you can add your comments in the dedicated text box. You can also: combine objects from different photos into one or delete objects from a photo, you can change the background, change clothes, outfits, make a color painting from a black and white photo, as well as order a painting from a damaged or old photo.

Just send a photo and

We will send you the design for free within 1 hour!
